plot: As a dark curse engulfs the city, a woman takes her own life, only to find that death is no escape. A hallucinogenic free-fall into the netherworld that's a retro blast of pure psychedelic crazy.
title: Opeth: The Devil's Orchard
plot_es: As a dark curse engulfs the city, a woman takes her own life, only to find that death is no escape. A hallucinogenic free-fall into the netherworld that's a retro blast of pure psychedelic crazy.
plot_en: As a dark curse engulfs the city, a woman takes her own life, only to find that death is no escape. A hallucinogenic free-fall into the netherworld that's a retro blast of pure psychedelic crazy.
